name: TimeTrinket
description:
Instructions

Move: WASD

Jump: Space

Turn Camera: Left / Right Arrow Keys

Left Mouse: Record / Rewind to point in time

Reset: R

Tips:

  • When rewinding to your recorded point in time, you keep your speed.
  • You can wall-ride by moving against a wall. You can jump while wall-riding.
Description

You are an enigmatic orb with the power to rewind time. Use your powers to delve deeper into the strange cosmic world you've found yourself in.

This was done for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2. I got a late start (Tuesday, 8/4/20), but I'm still very satisfied with the result. I learned some things, if nothing else!

NOTE: The WebGL build doesn't load; you have to download the game.

I don't know why. Maybe Unity 2020.1.0f1 is screwing with the build process. (The .html file did look different when I went in to change the resolution, after all, and the auto-detect size embed doesn't work...)
